item.title: EXTRAPERITONEAL Radical Prostatectomy for Prostate Cancer
item.description: What is Radical Prostatectomy? Radical prostatectomy is one of the primary treatment options for prostate cancer.

item.title: Risk Factors of Prostate Cancers
item.description: Recent news reports state that King Charles III of the United Kingdom will undergo surgery for benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH).

item.title: Da Vinci robotic assisted en bloc resection of multiple urologic organs
item.description: What is en bloc resection of multiple urologic organsï¼Ÿ The en bloc resection of multiple urologic organs refers to the “bilateral nephrectomy with bilateral ureterectomy and radical cystectomy.
